chess - package chess
This package corresponds to the chess layer.
chess.pieces - package chess.pieces
the package chess.pieces will contain the classes that will represent each type of chess piece.

ChessMatch - Class in chess
This class represent a chess match and will contain the logic of the game rules.
ChessMatch() - Constructor for class chess.ChessMatch
Creates a board of 8 rows and 8 columns and puts the chess pieces on the board using the ChessMatch.initialSetup() method.
ChessPiece - Class in chess
is the child class of the Piece class and will contain more properties common to all chess piece types.
ChessPiece(Board, Color) - Constructor for class chess.ChessPiece
creates a chess piece, which is associated with a board and has a color
ChessPosition - Class in chess
This is an auxiliary class, responsible for representing a chess position, that is, the coordinate system of a chess game.
ChessPosition(char, int) - Constructor for class chess.ChessPosition
generates a position that contains a column and a row (the representation of the columns is given by the letters a through h.
